title: Stable ColorOS 12 update goes live for the OPPO A93, A94, F17 Pro, F19 Pro, and more
content:
After releasing beta builds of ColorOS 12 to several devices over the last few weeks, OPPO has now started rolling out the stable release based on Android 12 to quite a few phones. These include the OPPO A93, A94, F17 Pro, F19 Pro, Reno 4 F, Reno 4 Lite, Reno 4 Pro 5G, Reno 5

The post Stable ColorOS 12 update goes live for the OPPO A93, A94, F17 Pro, F19 Pro, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO has started rolling out the first stable ColorOS 12 update for the OPPO A93, A94, F17 Pro, F19 Pro, Reno 4 F, Reno 4 Lite, and more!
